name: Synergy 44
description: This is an E-Commerce website. One of my client name Cynthia from USA, told me to build a website for her. She has a business of hair products. I built this E-Commerce website for her in 2021

name: BookstallBd
description: This is a Bangladeshi website. This isn't a production ready website. I'm still working on it. I'm building this website for one of my friend. His name is Sakibul Islam. He has a business of books

name: Akhlak Traders
description: One of my neighbour told me build a website for his T-Shirt business. I built this for him.

name: Cuebites
description: I got my first job in here. In cuebites, they ordered me to build their website with a new look. I built this with WordPress.

name: Darul Insan Madrasa
description: My beloved Teacher name Delwar Hossain asked me build a website for his madrasa. I built this for him. It was an amazing journey with him. I feel proud to work for my ustad.

name: IT Magnet
description: Another Australian client asked my team to redesign their website. I built this for him.

name: Fruits Warehouse
description: This is one of my react project made with react, react-router, react-query, and react-bootstrap. I also use expressjs and mongoDB in this website.

name: MotoParts BD
description: This is my best react project I've ever made. It has dashboard functionality. Authentication, CRUD, and many more.
